summary: A documentary on the curious American domestic terrorist group, infamous for the 1974 kidnapping of Patty Hearst.
cast: Russ Little|Michael Bortin|Timothy Findley|Dan Grove|Ludlow Kramer|John Lester|Marcus Foster|Catherine Hearst|Patricia Hearst|Randolph Hearst|Richard Neill|Ronald Reagan|Howard Shack|Evelle Younger|Spiro Agnew|Warren Burger|Henry Kissinger|Pat Nixon|Richard Nixon|Gaby Roslin
title: Guerrilla: The Taking of Patty Hearst
